medical_history.chief_complaint: Painful draining cysts on the trunk and buttocks.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 3-month history of painful draining cysts, which were initially treated with oral antibiotics. Lesions were previously present as acne in teenage years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Rheumatoid arthritis, depression, coronary artery disease, chronic atrial fibrillation, anemia, hypertension, chronic renal insufficiency.
medical_history.family_history: A son with severe acne treated with isotretinoin.
